column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This place met my expectations by far not only by how good the food was but service. We had tochos as a starter and I can't stop thinking of how delicious they were. The fruity pebble French toast also delicious. You also have to start with the breakfast in bed shot. When dinning I was happy to learn that they actually have a location in Southern Cali were we were visiting from. I will be recommending this place to all my friends.
